titles.title: A resolution condemning the commutation of the death sentence of Anthony George Battle granted by President Biden on December 23, 2024.
A resolution condemning the commutation of the death sentence of Anthony George Battle granted by President Biden on December 23, 2024.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary: This resolution condemns the commutation of the death sentence of Anthony George Battle by President Biden.
